description: Housed within the Cantine Nervi in the town centre, this contemporary restaurant with a completely open kitchen offers guests the choice of eating at the large counter facing the kitchen or at one of the more traditional tables. Very chic ambience, with a focus on imaginative and creative cuisine.
creditCards: ['Credit card / Debit card accepted', ' Mastercard credit card', ' Visa credit card']
